DOC.brief_summary: A comparative study determine whether bed rest embryo transfer ( ET ) affect IVF ( In Vitro Fertilization ) outcome . This study include 240 patient undergoing IVF treatment donate oocyte . All procedure IVF , embryo transfer , administration medication perform always variation . The highlighted procedure study immediately embryo transfer . There two group : one rest bed 10 minute transfer one rest transfer . Both procedure common , usually depend habitual clinical practice clinic internationally . Patients group receive routine post transfer instruction treatment .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Infertile Patients fertility problem due tubaric ovarian problem normozoospermatic couple Patient couple age age 20 49 year old BMI < 25 kg/m2 IVF treatment oocyte donation Elective transfer 2 embryos day 3 embryos day 5/6 embryo transfer First cycle embryo transfer Exclusion criterion : Patients uterine abnormality , significant uterine fibroid , Hydrosalphinx History recurrent pregnancy loss severe male factor exclude study
